name: The Annix Group
overview:
The Annix Group and it’s associated companies are part of a well diversified group of businesses established in Asia since 1994. The group aims to meet the growing Lifestyle and Leisure needs of the population of Singapore and the Asia/Pacific region.

The group established its credentials in the Fashion and Retail space with the launch of the Glitterati label when it caused a real buzz on Orchard Road in Singapore with the launch of its flagship store (www.glitterati.com.sg). The group has since diversified to develop and manage themed Events that meet the high expectations of Corporations and their High Net Worth (HNW) clients with the establishment of the Annix Leisure Group (www.annixleisure.com). Boutique Recruitment services (www.annixassociates.com) and Technology Consulting services (www.annixconsultants.com) enhanced the ability of the group by providing two key services to meet the growing needs of Corporations and their staff for working and living in Asia.
